Key Match Events: Paul George hyperextended his left knee while guarding Jalen Johnson in the second quarter.
Paul George started the game strong with eight points on 3-of-5 shooting, two rebounds, one assist, and one steal in 12 minutes.
Tyrese Maxey spearheaded the Sixers’ turnaround with 14 points on 5-of-18 shooting and seven assists.
Kelly Oubre Jr. added 14 points on 4-of-12 shooting.
Post-Match Reflections: Paul George said he is not too concerned about his knee injury and will evaluate it further.
Coach Nick Nurse mentioned that Joel Embiid will not play in any preseason games as part of his season-long management plan.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Joel Embiid remains sidelined for the 76ers’ preseason.
The Sixers’ new-look starting lineup included Eric Gordon replacing Caleb Martin, adding more outside shooting.
Rookie guard Jared McCain, who has gotten extensive playing time during the preseason, finished with 11 points and four rebounds.
